replyContent: To fix the problem, you need to re-activate the notification of the widget and clear the cache of the app (or uninstall and reinstall the app, it's the same). I worked a lot on this app, please don't give one star without giving me a chance to help you. I would appreciate if you will write to me at riccardo.camattari@gmail.com. I'm here to help

content: Excellent so far..
I have got rid of my bedroom clocks, this app is everything I need.

If you're looking for a full screen digital clock, this is the one! I almost *never* write reviews unless I am overjoyed with a product, or so angry I feel like strangling ... someone. The reason for this review is the former. I had been using a different full screen digital clock for some time, but it kept displaying an errant 1400 alarm on the screen that I couldn't get rid of. An email to the developer went unanswered. So I went looking for another app to see if *that* would make a difference. I found 'Huge Digital Clock' and installed it, but the errant 1400 alarm persisted. But, n HCD's Setting menu, I found this, "Is the alarm wrong? Fix the bug" Aha! Now I at least had a clue: It may be my calendar. Long story short and a quick email exchange with Riccardo and the problem has been solved! I bought the Pro version but would have paid five times as much for solving my problem.
I use this with a cheap 7 inch tablet as my bedside alarm clock and I love it to bits. Couldn't imagine life without it. Five gold stars for design and customisation options.

This app is great, I've been thinking about getting a digital clock app for a while and I'm glad I chose this one, so many options in settings and stays on all the time, won't have to buy a bedside alarm clock now. Superb.
This a a gem for my Mom.. I like it too!
This app is amazing. Developer is super responsive. I love it!!!
Wanted a bolder display, got it. Also like the widget for my home screen. Found widget settings, awesome. Pls add extra star!!!
Love it- pro version is epic thx for a great product that has so many options, bells and whistles!
HUGE Clock is a great app! It does exactly what is needed with minimal battery drain. It's versatile & flexible enough to meet the needs of a wide variety of users.

I initially had usability issues which was a case of RTFM! The app works great now, especially when used as a screen saver. A feature request would be to have notifications displayed. Recommended app üëå
replyContent: Thanks! I am constantly working on improving the app, I hope I have time to add notifications as well

content: Best clock app out there

This paid version offers more customizable features than the free version does. I would like to see: (option) the am/pm behind the time. (option) move the battery indicator to the right of the setting icon, in the top left; current position enabled can cause the date to overlap the time. (option) manually specify a location for weather instead of requiring location service turned on.
replyContent: Hi, thanks for the review. The location can be set manually starting with the next version of the Pro app. I'm working on adding some features, including this one. I encourage you to email me, it's easier to discuss. My address is riccardo.camattari@gmail.com

content: Love the clock!!!
Top app I love it that much I've bought the pro version. Customer service, second to none. Thank you.
Great night clock. Lots of options to optimize the clock for yourself. Developer is very responsive. I paid for the upgrade mostly to support the developer.

I have been using this app for a number of weeks now and find it very good. The display is clear but can be dimmed for night use. The display colour can be changed; I find red is best, and doesn't disturb me at night. I had a small issue with a time off-set but after contacting Riccardo he sorted it for me straight away. A very good app and excellent customer service.
Great app, just what I've been looking for after some not so good apps tried and discarded. Also when I encountered an issue, the developer emailed me back in minutes
It does everything I need. I like the size, easy to read. Thumbs up!üòä
Works great on cheapo pixel 4a android 11

I searched a long time and tried lots of night clocks, but all had one or more shortcomings. This one does almost everything I wanted! You can set the color, background, size, and font; choose 12- or 24-hour display; rotate between portrait and landscape; choose to display day, date, weather, alarm; hide the Settings button and notification bar; set the clock to speak the time; and much more. Screen burn-in prevention is a very valuable feature. It moves the clock display, almost imperceptibly, from time to time.You can also dim by swiping down or set a fixed dim level in Settings. UPDATE: The developer responded quickly and personally to my inquiries about features, and tried to accommodate requests.
Great clock. Just what you need to replace the the bedside clock.
This is the best bedside clock ever. I looked for apps, I looked for actual clocks, but this was the first clock I was able to put next to my bed that I can see clearly and doesn't blind me.
Perfect night clock. Easy to use.
Super!
Great app üëç

I wanted an app to turn my phone into a regular-looking alarm clock. You can set custom colours and simply swipe the screen up and down to adjust the brightness - totally wonderful. The authour is friendly and wants to do a good job and is eager to please.
Love this App. does exactly what is advertised.
Great clock app, has all the features I like... But one question, can you import your own font somehow?

content: Excellent clock app... clean and very customizable, simply works great! One minor note is with the alarm time display - shows 5 minutes sooner than the system alarm. It's been years and I was hoping Samsung (Note9 on Android 10) would have fixed it by now. Grazie Mille!
replyContent: Hi! Thanks for your review. Yes, it is a problem of Samsung phones. I think it's done on purpose, Samsung doesn't like thrid part developers. In the settings of my app there is an option to fix this bug. Let me know by email if you need help.

I have woken on a couple of mornings to discover my phone battery was flat because the charging cable was not properly pushed in. There may be many people who, like me, place their phones a distance from their beds at night - hence the need for a large clock display. Having a subtle indicator that the phone is charging which can easily be discerned from a distance in the dark would be a huge bonus. All the same, it's a great app!

content: Excellent app for displaying an on-screen clock in large figures. Good: The "thick" font displays a clock in big, clear figures. When run from the app's icon, the landscape mode adjusts to the actual landscape orientation. Bad: When in screensaver mode while charging, the clock's landscape mode does not work correctly. It only displays a pre-set landscape orientation, without regard to the actual orientation of the phone. Given that my phone's cover has a stand that makes it orientate in the opposite direction, I have an upside-down clock when my phone is charging. I am using a Sony Xperia X Compact, running Android 8.0.0.
replyContent: Thank you for your review. Please try the updated version, now you can rotate the display during the screensaver mode. Just touch more than once the rotation button. Disabling the phone's autorotation should also help. If it worked, five-star rating would be important to me

content: Perfect in functionality could use anti burn in protection where it shifts around every few minutes but still works awesome
